Label: Education Management
Definition: Purposes associated with running and management of educational organisations and services

Label: AccessManagement
Definition: Purposes associated with determination and management of access to educational programs, resources, and services

Label: Staff Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of staff and related personnel in educational organisations

Label: Staff Performance Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with assessment of performance of staff and related personnel in the context of an educational organisation

Label: Student Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of current and prospective students

Label: Student Admission Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of admission process for current and prospective students

Label: Student Admission Screening
Definition: Purposes associated with screening and filtering students and prospective students for the purposes of admission to educational organisations, resources, and services

Label: Student Eligibility Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with eligibility assessment of students and prospective students for the purposes of admission and access to educational institutes, resources, and services

Label: StudentAllocation
Definition: Purposes associated with allocation of students to educational institutes, resources, and services

Label: Student Course Allocation
Definition: Purposes associated with allocation of students to specific courses in the context of educational services

Label: Student Program Allocation
Definition: Purposes associated with allocation of students to specific programs in the context of educational services

Label: Student Institute Allocation
Definition: Purposes associated with allocation of students to specific educational or other institutes in the context of educational services

Label: Student Course Recommendation
Definition: Purposes associated with providing recommendations to students regarding prospective courses for education

Label: Student Program Recommendation
Definition: Purposes associated with providing recommendations to students regarding prospective programs for education

Label: Student Institute Recommendation
Definition: Purposes associated with providing recommendations to students regarding prospective institutes for education

Label: Student Enrolment Management
Definition: Purposes associated with enrolment of students and prospective students in educational courses, programs, and institutes

Label: Student Special Needs Management
Definition: Purposes associated with determination and management of special needs of students and prospective students in the context of educational services and resources

Label: Student Fees Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of fees from or for students in the context of educational resources and services

Label: Student Financial Benefits Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of financial benefits for students in the context of educational resources and services

Label: Student Performance Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of student performance in educational contexts

Label: Student Performance Monitoring
Definition: Purposes associated with monitoring of student performance in educational contexts

Label: Student Performance Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with assessment of student performance, including through exams and assignments, in educational contexts

Label: Student Academic Potential Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with assessment of academic potential as a measure of the capability of the student for specific academic or educational courses, programs, or services

Label: Student Learning Needs Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with assessment of learning needs or a measure of what resources, services, and approaches are needed for a student to learn and gain specific knowledge or group of knowledge within an educational context

Label: Student Learning Outcome Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with assessment of student performance in the context of meeting learning outcomes as set within the educational course or program

Label: Student Exam Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with assessment of student performance in the context of an educational exam

Label: Student Assignment Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with assessment of student performance in the context of an educational assignment or task or other processes where the student is required to perform an activity which is then assessed

Label: Service Provision
Definition: Purposes associated with provision of educational services, including lectures, seminars, laboratory work, and other similar activities within the context of provision of education

Label: Student Attendance Management
Definition: Purposes associated with undertaking and management of attendance of students within an educational context

Label: Student Resource Access Management
Definition: Purposes associated with determining and managing access to students to specific resources within an educational context, such as laboratory equipment or library resources

Label: Student Content Delivery
Definition: Purposes associated with delivery of content to student or group of students in the context of educational services

Label: Student Personalised Content Delivery
Definition: Purposes associated with personalisation of the content delivery for an individual student or a group of students in the context of educational services

Label: Student Learning Feedback Management
Definition: Purposes associated with creating, providing, and managing feedback for students regarding their learning potential and outcomes in the context of educational services

Label: Student Wellbeing Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of student wellbeing in an educational context

Label: Student Guidance Management
Definition: Purposes associated with providing and managing guidance, counselling, and other related services within the context of educational services

Label: Student Social Activities Management
Definition: Purposes associated with promotion, admission, and management of social activities for students within an educational context

Label: Student Integrity Management
Definition: Purposes associated with integrity assessment and management of students and activities by students in an educational context

Label: Student Plagiarism Detection
Definition: Purposes associated with determination of plagiarism demonstrated by a student or students or present within the work submitted by a student or students in an educational context

Label: Student Identity Verification
Definition: Purposes associated with verification of a student's identity in an educational context, such as for exams or access to resources

Label: Student Cheating Assessment
Definition: Purposes associated with detection, assessment, and management of activities considered as cheating or other activities considered to subvert rules or to obtain unfair advantage in the context of educational services and assessments

Label: Student Misconduct Investigation
Definition: Purposes associated with investigating and assessing potential misconduct by or on a student or a group of students in an educational context

Label: Student Integrity Training
Definition: Purposes associated with providing, assessing, and managing training for students regarding integrity in an educational context

Label: Student Proctoring
Definition: Purposes associated with proctoring i.e. monitoring of students during an assessment with the aim of ensuring they do not cheat

Label: Student In Person Proctoring
Definition: Purposes associated with in-person or physical proctoring i.e. monitoring of students physically present within a particular location during an assessment with the aim of ensuring they do not cheat

Label: Student Online Proctoring
Definition: Purposes associated with online or virtual or remote proctoring i.e. monitoring of students present virtually over an online platform or within their remote physical location during an assessment with the aim of ensuring they do not cheat

Label: Research Management
Definition: Purposes associated with research activities and management of research activities within an educational context e.g. within university departments or research groups

Label: Research Integrity Management
Definition: Purposes associated with assessment, determination, and management of integrity for or of research activities and outputs in an educational or academic research context

Label: Research Data Management
Definition: Purposes associated with management of data in an educational or academic research context

Label: Research User Study Management
Definition: Purposes associated with conducting and assessing studies involving people (as user studies) in an educational or academic research context
